Publications¶

  • MENDES, A. S.; ACKERMANN, M. ; LEONARDI, F. ; FLEURY, A. T. . Yaw stability analysis of articulated vehicles using phase trajectory method. Diname, 2017
  • MENDES, A. S.; MENEGHETTI, D. R. ; ACKERMANN, M. ; FLEURY, A. T. . Vehicle Dynamics - Lateral: Open Source Simulation Package for MATLAB. In: Congresso SAE Brasil, 2016, São Paulo. SAE Technical Paper Series, 2016.
  • MENDES, A. S. . Análise de estabilidade em guinada de veículos articulados (In english: Yaw stability analysis of articulated vehicles) Centro Universitário FEI, 2016
